description: PM Giuseppe Conte says infections could rise again but the country cannot afford to wait for a vaccine.
title: Coronavirus: Italy takes 'calculated risk' in easing restrictions - PM
title_page: Coronavirus: Italy takes 'calculated risk' in easing restrictions - PM - BBC News
maintext: Catholic churches are preparing for the resumption of Mass on the same day, but there will be strict social distancing and worshippers must wear face masks. Other faiths will also be allowed to hold religious services.
